title: Strengthening Healthcare Competencies: VR-Based Intercultural Communication Competency (ICC) Improvement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and awareness of cultural diversity
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify nonverbal communication styles (e.g., eye contact, gestures) across cultures in a VR environment with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can create VR content simulating cross-cultural scenarios using generative AI tools.
Learners can propose three or more practical strategies to reduce cultural biases through project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
